title: Power Levelling Anyone?
body: Because of the upcoming new season, I though I would make myself a smurf. I saw some videos, about getting to lvl 30 with double exp boosts with Twisted Treeline Co-Op games. It could apparently take only 17 hours. Add my smurf WhiteishFire if you want to power-level with me! (Also pls list what times u can play.)
